meanings.definition: A group of people believed to be superior or dominant in a society.
meanings.sent1: The herrenvolks in the story always looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: The herrenvolks of the town were known for their arrogance.
meanings.sent3: The herrenvolks at the party acted like they owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The herrenvolks of the school ruled over the student body.
meanings.sent5: The herrenvolks were like kings in their own little world.

meanings.definition: The concept or belief in the superiority of a particular race or ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The herrenvolks in history often led to discrimination and injustice.
meanings.sent2: The herrenvolks ideology has caused harm throughout the years.
meanings.sent3: The herrenvolks theory was debunked by modern science.
meanings.sent4: The herrenvolks mindset can be dangerous and divisive.
meanings.sent5: The herrenvolks belief can lead to harmful prejudices.
